info.name: Fastly
info.description: The Fastly API is a RESTful API that supports all features available through the Fastly web interface. Use the libraries below to guide the development of your sites and applications.

item.name: ACL
item.description:
An ACL is a named access control list for matching against a client's IP address during VCL processing. A new ACL is empty and is attached to a working version of a service (not locked or active). The version associated with the ACL must be activated to be used. To remove an ACL from use, the ACL must be deleted from a working version (not locked or active), and that version without the ACL must be activated.

[ACL Documentation](https://docs.fastly.com/api/config#acl)

request.description:
**Description:**

List ACLs.

**Request Configuration:**

- Update URL with **version_no**

[Documentation](https://docs.fastly.com/api/config#acl_5dfdb4b644ee42fcb71f3c3f139e3b0d)

**Description:**

Retrieve a single ACL by name for the version and service.

**Request Configuration:**

- Update URL with **version_no**
- Update URL with **acl_name**

[Documentation](https://docs.fastly.com/api/config#acl_ea46be7e9fb009d231bdc47690cc1762)

**Description:**

Create a new ACL for a particular service and version.

**Request Configuration:**

- Update URL with **version_no**
- Update **name** property in body

[Documentation](https://docs.fastly.com/api/config#acl_c2e66498f77f346e715deedb616f2dcd)

**Description:**

Update ACL for a particular service and version.

**Request Configuration:**

- Update URL with **version_no**
- Update URL with **acl_name**
- Update **name** property in body

[Documentation](https://docs.fastly.com/api/config#acl_a07615df96bab601c4889062fa5869a0)

**Description:**

Delete an ACL for a particular service and version.

**Request Configuration:**

- Update URL with **version_no**
- Update URL with **acl_name**

[Documentation](https://docs.fastly.com/api/config#acl_62526fdbe826b794a6655fbb66f987a9)

item.name: ACL Entry
item.description:
An ACL entry holds an IP address with optional subnet to make up an entry in an ACL. ACL entries are versionless and can be modified without activating a new version. ACL entries can also be negated.

[ACL Entry Documentation](https://docs.fastly.com/api/config#acl_entry)

request.description:
**Description:**

List of ACL entries given service and ACL ID.

**Request Configuration:**

- Update URL with **acl_id**

[Documentation](https://docs.fastly.com/api/config#acl_entry_25ff5c4d6ab5f53842e216a4ea355978)

**Description:**

Retrieve a single ACL entry given service, ACL ID and entry ID.

**Request Configuration:**

- Update URL with **acl_id**
- Update URL with **entry_id**

[Documentation](https://docs.fastly.com/api/config#acl_entry_a637fad7f4c0014d2168d0a3b6f6a769)

**Description:**

Create ACL entry given service, ACL ID and properties.

**Request Configuration:**

- Update URL with **acl_id**
- Update **ip** property in body
- Update **subnet** property in body
- Update **negated** property in body
- Update **comment** property in body

[Documentation](https://docs.fastly.com/api/config#acl_entry_777431aac7f63fee19c553c1fc9fae06)

**Description:**

Delete ACL entry given service, ACL ID, and entry ID.

**Request Configuration:**

- Update URL with **acl_id**
- Update URL with **entry_id**

[Documentation](https://docs.fastly.com/api/config#acl_entry_8ab8e771a201b24bee9ee64c7a45f464)

**Description:**

Update ACL entry given service, ACL ID, entry ID and properties.

**Request Configuration:**

- Update URL with **acl_id**
- Update URL with **entry_id**
- Update **ip** property in body
- Update **subnet** property in body
- Update **negated** property in body
- Update **comment** property in body

[Documentation](https://docs.fastly.com/api/config#acl_entry_2d6a045ce1db8c8d5229747d9c494e4b)

**Description:**

Update ACL entries in batch given service, ACL ID, entry ID and properties.

Value of **op** can be either:
- create
- update
- delete

**Request Configuration:**

- Update URL with **acl_id**
- Update **op** property in body
- Update **ip** property in body
- Update **subnet** property in body
- Update **negated** property in body
- Update **comment** property in body

[Documentation](https://docs.fastly.com/api/config#acl_entry_c352ca5aee49b7898535cce488e3ba82)

item.name: API Tokens
item.description:
API tokens are unique authentication identifiers that you can create for the users and applications authorized to interact with your service. You can scope the authorization of tokens to a single service, and you can restrict access to purge all by limiting tokens to purging by URL and surrogate keys. Because users can create multiple API tokens, you can rotate tokens without taking services offline, and you can revoke individual tokens without having to update other API integrations.

[API Tokens Documentation](https://docs.fastly.com/api/auth#tokens)

request.description:
**Description:**

List all tokens belonging to the authenticated user.

[Documentation](https://docs.fastly.com/api/auth#tokens_d59ff8612bae27a2317278abb048db0c)

**Description:**

List all tokens belonging to a specific customer.

[Documentation](https://docs.fastly.com/api/auth#tokens_bc1370f9b3432d4423d35aa25a889c5a)

**Description:**

Get a single token based on the access_token used in the request.

[Documentation](https://docs.fastly.com/api/auth#tokens_bb00e7ed542cbcd7f32b5c908b8ce244)

**Description:**

Create an API token.

This token is limited to a service, to an expiration, and to a scope access level!

- Expiration date format (e.g., 2016-07-28T19:24:50+00:00)
- Scopes (global, purge_select, purge_all)

**Request Configuration:**

- Update **Fastly-OTP** property in headers (only if two-factor authentication is enabled)
- Update **expires_at** property in body
- Update **scope** property in body
- Update **name** property in body

[Documentation](https://docs.fastly.com/api/auth#tokens_db4655a45a0107448eb0676577446e40)

**Description:**

Create an API token.

This token is not limited to a service, to an expiration, and to a scope access level!

**Request Configuration:**

- Update **Fastly-OTP** property in headers (only if two-factor authentication is enabled)
- Update **name** property in body

[Documentation](https://docs.fastly.com/api/auth#tokens_db4655a45a0107448eb0676577446e40)

**Description:**

Revoke a token that is used to authenticate the request.

[Documentation](https://docs.fastly.com/api/auth#tokens_e0b9ecbbbfc21f5ee6531441bf743082)

**Description:**

Revoke a specific token by its id.

**Request Configuration:**

- Update URL with **token_id**

[Documentation](https://docs.fastly.com/api/auth#tokens_4a958ba69402500937f0d8570f7ce86f)

item.name: Backend
item.description:
A backend is an address (IP or domain) from which Fastly pulls content. There can be multiple backends for a service.

[Backend Documentation](https://docs.fastly.com/api/config#backend)

request.description:
**Description:**

List all backends for a particular service and version.

**Request Configuration:**

- Update URL with **version_no**

[Documentation](https://docs.fastly.com/api/config#backend_fb0e875c9a7669f071cbf89ca32c7f69)

**Description:**

Get the backend for a particular service and version.

**Request Configuration:**

- Update URL with **version_no** 
- Update URL with **backend_name**

[Documentation](https://docs.fastly.com/api/config#backend_5c0b2bcd6144eadbb6570ddf3c454b8b)

**Description:**

Create a backend for a particular service and version.

**Request Configuration:**

- Update URL with **version_no** 
- Update **ipv4** property in body
- Update **name** property in body
- Update **port** property in body
- Update **comment** property in body

[Documentation](https://docs.fastly.com/api/config#backend_85c170418ee71191dbb3b5046aeb6c2c)

**Description:**

Update the backend for a particular service and version.

**Request Configuration:**

- Update URL with **version_no** 
- Update URL with **backend_name** 
- Update **ipv4** property in body
- Update **name** property in body
- Update **port** property in body
- Update **comment** property in body

[Documentation](https://docs.fastly.com/api/config#backend_fb3b3529417c70f57458644f7aec652e)

**Description:**

Delete the backend for a particular service and version.

**Request Configuration:**

- Update URL with **version_no** 
- Update URL with **backend_name**

[Documentation](https://docs.fastly.com/api/config#backend_a00ce4b7a448b63d26016837907e7bfa)

item.name: Billing
item.description:
Get information on current and past bills.

[Billing Documentation](https://docs.fastly.com/api/account#billing)

request.description:
**Description:**

Get the invoice for a given year and month.

**Request Configuration:**

- Update URL with **billing_year**
- Update URL with **billing_month**

[Documentation](https://docs.fastly.com/api/account#billing_bd3ea2cbea58ddbb82bbde0c1981fd8b)

item.name: Billing Address
item.description:
A billing address is used to calculate your bill correctly.

[Billing Address Documentation](https://docs.fastly.com/api/account#billing_address)

request.description:
**Description:**

Get a customer's billing address.

[Documentation](https://docs.fastly.com/api/account#billing_address_01449df2d3702b2f6b333e0c1a33c6d5)

**Description:**

Delete a customer's billing address.

[Documentation](https://docs.fastly.com/api/account#billing_address_522cd343bac2efbd334cdf90ebf5d619)

item.name: Cache Settings
item.description:
Controls how caching is performed on Fastly. When used in conjunction with Conditions the Cache Settings provide you with fine grain control over how long content persists in the cache.

[Cache Settings Documentation](https://docs.fastly.com/api/config#cache_settings)

request.description:
**Description:**

Get a list of all cache settings for a particular service and version.

**Request Configuration:**

- Update URL with **version_no**

[Documentation](https://docs.fastly.com/api/config#cache_settings_0d6fb6b78afaa453ec69a5dbd4038322)

**Description:**

Get a specific cache settings object.

**Request Configuration:**

- Update URL with **version_no**

- Update URL with **cache_setting_name**

[Documentation](https://docs.fastly.com/api/config#cache_settings_9e1fcc14944551fadf3da3f87ff338a9)

**Description:**

Create a cache settings object.

Action can be:
- cache
- pass
- restart

**Request Configuration:**

- Update URL with **version_no**
- Update **name** property in body
- Update **stale_ttl** property in body
- Update **ttl** property in body
- Update **action** property in body

[Documentation](https://docs.fastly.com/api/config#cache_settings_015578a5dee074dd7fa45c4962b2c867)

**Description:**

Update a specific cache settings object.

Action can be:
- cache
- pass
- restart

**Request Configuration:**

- Update URL with **version_no**
- Update URL with **cache_setting_name**
- Update **name** property in body
- Update **stale_ttl** property in body
- Update **ttl** property in body
- Update **action** property in body

[Documentation](https://docs.fastly.com/api/config#cache_settings_3416e629201894d017dc69fd07500eda)

**Description:**

Delete a specific cache settings object.

**Request Configuration:**

- Update URL with **version_no**
- Update URL with **cache_setting_name**

[Documentation](https://docs.fastly.com/api/config#cache_settings_9adabaabeb01d84b2c02c2dbc5b4bbda)

item.name: Condition
item.description:
Conditions are used to control when and how other objects are used in a service configuration. They contain a statement that evaluates to either true or false and is used to determine whether the condition is met. 

Depending on the type of the condition, the statement field can make reference to the Varnish variables **req**, **resp**, and/or **beresp**.

[Condition Documentation](https://docs.fastly.com/api/config#condition)

request.description:
**Description:**

Get all conditions for a particular service and version.

**Request Configuration:**

- Update URL with **version_no**

[Documentation](https://docs.fastly.com/api/config#condition_b61196c572f473c89863a81cc5912861)

**Description:**

Get the specified condition.

**Request Configuration:**

- Update URL with **version_no**
- Update URL with **condition_name**

[Documentation](https://docs.fastly.com/api/config#condition_149a2f48485ceb335f70504e5269b77e)

**Description:**

Creates a new condition.

Type of the condition can be:
- REQUEST
- RESPONSE
- CACHE

**Request Configuration:**

- Update URL with **version_no**
- Update **name** property in body
- Update **statement** property in body
- Update **priority** property in body
- Update **comment** property in body
- Update **type** property in body

[Documentation](https://docs.fastly.com/api/config#condition_551199dbec2271195319b675d8659226)

**Description:**

Updates the specified condition.

Type of the condition can be:
- REQUEST
- RESPONSE
- CACHE

**Request Configuration:**

- Update URL with **version_no**
- Update URL with **condition_name**
- Update **name** property in body
- Update **statement** property in body
- Update **priority** property in body
- Update **comment** property in body
- Update **type** property in body

[Documentation](https://docs.fastly.com/api/config#condition_01a2c4e4b44943b541e001013b665deb)

**Description:**

Deletes the specified condition.

**Request Configuration:**

- Update URL with **version_no**
- Update URL with **condition_name**

[Documentation](https://docs.fastly.com/api/config#condition_2b902b7649c46b4541f00a920d06c94d)

item.name: Customer
item.description:
A Customer is the base object which owns your Users and Services.

[Customer Documentation](https://docs.fastly.com/api/account#customer)

request.description:
**Description:**

List all users from a specified customer id.

[Documentation](https://docs.fastly.com/api/account#customer_12f4a69627ba3bbb1c8668aae03a60ad)

**Description:**

Get the logged in customer.

[Documentation](https://docs.fastly.com/api/account#customer_01dffc0769482c6e3501ccb07da8491e)

item.name: Dictionary
item.description:
A Dictionary is a table that stores key value pairs accessible to VCL functions during VCL processing. A new dictionary is empty and attached to a working version of a service (not locked/active). In order for the dictionary to appear in generated VCL, the version associated with the dictionary must be activated. To remove a dictionary, the dictionary must be deleted on a working version (not locked/active), and that version without the dictionary then must be activated.

[Dictionary Documentation](https://docs.fastly.com/api/config#dictionary)

request.description:
**Description:**

List all dictionaries for the version of the service.

**Request Configuration:**

- Update URL with **version_no**

[Documentation](https://docs.fastly.com/api/config#dictionary_6d2cc293b994eb8c16d93e92e91f3915)

**Description:**

Retrieve a single dictionary by name for the version and service.

**Request Configuration:**

- Update URL with **version_no**
- Update URL with **dictionary_name**

[Documentation](https://docs.fastly.com/api/config#dictionary_0e16df083830ed3b6c30b73dcef64014)

**Description:**

Create named dictionary for a particular service and version.

**Request Configuration:**

- Update URL with **version_no**
- Update **name** property in body

[Documentation](https://docs.fastly.com/api/config#dictionary_7d48b87bf82433162a3b209292722125)

**Description:**

Update named dictionary for a particular service and version.

**Request Configuration:**

- Update URL with **version_no**
- Update URL with **dictionary_name**
- Update **name** property in body

[Documentation](https://docs.fastly.com/api/config#dictionary_8c9da370b1591d99e5389143a5589a32)

**Description:**

Delete named dictionary for a particular service and version.

**Request Configuration:**

- Update URL with **version_no**
- Update URL with **dictionary_name**

[Documentation](https://docs.fastly.com/api/config#dictionary_9a447790d8a0788896cac0679a0350f8)

item.name: Dictionary Item
item.description:
A DictionaryItem holds a key and value that make up an entry in a Dictionary. DictionaryItems are versionless so they can be modified without activating a new version.

[Dictionary Item Documentation](https://docs.fastly.com/api/config#dictionary_item)

request.description:
**Description:**

List of DictionaryItems given service and dictionary ID.

**Request Configuration:**

- Update URL with **dictionary_id**

[Documentation](https://docs.fastly.com/api/config#dictionary_item_a48de28cd7e76c1ea58523f39bb7204b)

**Description:**

Retrieve a single DictionaryItem given service, dictionary ID and item key.

**Request Configuration:**

- Update URL with **dictionary_id**
- Update URL with **item_key**

[Documentation](https://docs.fastly.com/api/config#dictionary_item_08f090cd03ed4602ae63f131087e2f29)

**Description:**

Create DictionaryItem given service, dictionary ID, item key, and item value.

**Request Configuration:**

- Update URL with **dictionary_id**
- Update **item_key** property in body
- Update **item_value** property in body

[Documentation](https://docs.fastly.com/api/config#dictionary_item_6ec455c0ba1b21671789e1362bc7fe55)

**Description:**

Upsert DictionaryItem given service, dictionary ID, item key, and item value.

**Request Configuration:**

- Update URL with **dictionary_id**
- Update URL with **item_key**
- Update **item_value** property in body

[Documentation](https://docs.fastly.com/api/config#dictionary_item_34c884a7cdce84dfcfd38dac7a0b5bb0)

**Description:**

Update DictionaryItem given service, dictionary ID, item key, and item value.

**Request Configuration:**

- Update URL with **dictionary_id**
- Update URL with **item_key**
- Update **item_value** property in body

[Documentation](https://docs.fastly.com/api/config#dictionary_item_40bd364dad67e55f6f7edb92a82a4fd0)

**Description:**

Update DictionaryItem in batch for given service, dictionary ID and key/value pairs for items.

Value of **op** can be either:
- create
- update
- delete

**Request Configuration:**

- Update URL with **dictionary_id**
- Update **op** property in body
- Update **item_key** property in body
- Update **item_value** property in body

[Documentation](https://docs.fastly.com/api/config#dictionary_item_dc826ce1255a7c42bc48eb204eed8f7f)

**Description:**

Delete DictionaryItem given service, dictionary ID, and item key.

**Request Configuration:**

- Update URL with **dictionary_id**
- Update URL with **item_key**

[Documentation](https://docs.fastly.com/api/config#dictionary_item_664347e743b8eafc9a93c729d9da0427)

item.name: Diff
item.description:
See the changes in configuration between two different versions of a service.

[Diff Documentation](https://docs.fastly.com/api/config#diff)

request.description:
**Description:**

Get diff between two versions.

**Request Configuration:**

- Update URL with **from_version**
- Update URL with **to_version**

[Documentation](https://docs.fastly.com/api/config#diff_58ed0abc145283e02d20489a24bc439b)

item.name: Director
item.description:
A Director is responsible for balancing requests among a group of Backends. In addition to simply balancing, Directors can be configured to attempt retrying failed requests. Additionally, Directors have a quorum setting which can be used to determine when the Director as a whole is considered "up", in order to prevent "server whack-a-mole" following an outage as servers come back up.

[Director Documentation](https://docs.fastly.com/api/config#director)

request.description:
**Description:**

List the directors for a particular service and version.

**Request Configuration:**

- Update URL with **version_no**

[Documentation](https://docs.fastly.com/api/config#director_a0bd94075a81102f3ca4ff1f498a48ef)

**Description:**

Get the director for a particular service and version.

**Request Configuration:**

- Update URL with **version_no**
- Update URL with **director_name**

[Documentation](https://docs.fastly.com/api/config#director_98da5c0617843d547c33a47d214eeb26)

**Description:**

Create a director for a particular service and version.

Type of the director can be:
- 1=random
- 2=round-robin
- 3=hash
- 3=hash

**Request Configuration:**

- Update URL with **version_no**
- Update **name** property in body
- Update **comment** property in body
- Update **type** property in body
- Update **quorum** property in body
- Update **retries** property in body
- Update **capacity** property in body

[Documentation](https://docs.fastly.com/api/config#director_c533bd0e9feb118959406c540b085ce1)

**Description:**

Update the director for a particular service and version.

Type of the director can be:
- 1=random
- 2=round-robin
- 3=hash
- 3=hash

**Request Configuration:**

- Update URL with **version_no**
- Update URL with **director_name**
- Update **comment** property in body
- Update **type** property in body
- Update **quorum** property in body
- Update **retries** property in body
- Update **capacity** property in body

[Documentation](https://docs.fastly.com/api/config#director_96a02b07eb58711a94d585ea228e62c3)

**Description:**

Delete the director for a particular service and version.

**Request Configuration:**

- Update URL with **version_no**
- Update URL with **director_name**

[Documentation](https://docs.fastly.com/api/config#director_a0279c85ea20c315855e393ab63e2524)

item.name: Director Backend
item.description:
Maps and relates backends as belonging to directors. Backends can belong to any number of directors but directors can only hold one reference to a specific backend.

[Director Backend Documentation](https://docs.fastly.com/api/config#director_backend)

request.description:
**Description:**

Returns the relationship between a Backend and a Director. If the Backend has been associated with the Director, it returns a simple record indicating this. Otherwise, returns a 404.

**Request Configuration:**

- Update URL with **version_no**
- Update URL with **director_name**
- Update URL with **backend_name**

[Documentation](https://docs.fastly.com/api/config#director_backend_80bd8da752936527f466566783c10733)

**Description:**

Establishes a relationship between a Backend and a Director. The Backend is then considered a member of the Director and can be used to balance traffic onto.

**Request Configuration:**

- Update URL with **version_no**
- Update URL with **director_name**
- Update URL with **backend_name**

[Documentation](https://docs.fastly.com/api/config#director_backend_6926a1fc561d50ab8773e8c6c8382d38)

**Description:**

Deletes the relationship between a Backend and a Director. The Backend is no longer considered a member of the Director and thus will not have traffic balanced onto it from this Director.

**Request Configuration:**

- Update URL with **version_no**
- Update URL with **director_name**
- Update URL with **backend_name**

[Documentation](https://docs.fastly.com/api/config#director_backend_92985fb9fc147d24a0c8a3720dafd5e1)

item.name: Domain
item.description:
A domain represents the domain name through which visitors will retrieve content. There can be multiple domains for a service.

[Domain Documentation](https://docs.fastly.com/api/config#domain)

request.description:
**Description:**

Checks the status of all domains' DNS records for a Service Version. Returns an array of 3 items. The first is the details for the domain, the second is the current CNAME of the domain, and the third is a boolean indicating whether or not it has been properly setup to use Fastly.

**Request Configuration:**

- Update URL with **version_no**

[Documentation](https://docs.fastly.com/api/config#domain_e33a599694c3316f00b6b8d53a2db7d9)

**Description:**

Checks the status of a specific domain's DNS record for a Service Version. Returns an array in the same format as domain/check_all.

**Request Configuration:**

- Update URL with **version_no**
- Update URL with **domain_name**

[Documentation](https://docs.fastly.com/api/config#domain_30a3f14c9a0ce5730757d39983ab7dc6)

**Description:**

List all the domains for a particular service and version.

**Request Configuration:**

- Update URL with **version_no**

[Documentation](https://docs.fastly.com/api/config#domain_6d340186666771f022ca20f81609d03d)

**Description:**

Get the domain for a particular service and version.

**Request Configuration:**

- Update URL with **version_no**
- Update URL with **domain_name**

[Documentation](https://docs.fastly.com/api/config#domain_f1b5fab17a0729daeeaf7594b47759c5)

**Description:**

Create a domain for a particular service and version.

**Request Configuration:**

- Update URL with **version_no**
- Update **name** property in body
- Update **comment** property in body

[Documentation](https://docs.fastly.com/api/config#domain_90345101274774ff1b84f0a7dd010b01)

**Description:**

Update the domain for a particular service and version.

**Request Configuration:**

- Update URL with **version_no**
- Update URL with **domain_name**
- Update **name** property in body
- Update **comment** property in body

[Documentation](https://docs.fastly.com/api/config#domain_2ef42bd9b4c56c86b46dc0e36096ab10)

**Description:**

Delete the domain for a particular service and versions.

**Request Configuration:**

- Update URL with **version_no**
- Update URL with **domain_name**

[Documentation](https://docs.fastly.com/api/config#domain_aab5a322f58df2b1db8dc276e8594a70)
